title: Parking Fee Calculator
description: Estimate parking fees using entry/exit times and pricing rules.

helper.overnight: If the exit time is earlier than the entry time, we count it as the next day.
helper.feeRule: After the base time, fees are added per unit.

validation.missingTime: Please enter both entry and exit times.
validation.invalidNumber: Fees and minutes must be 0 or higher.
validation.unitMinutes: Additional unit must be at least 1 minute.

examples.title: Example
items: Base 30 min 1,000 KRW + 500 KRW per 10 min
Daily maximum of 20,000 KRW is applied

openGraph.title: Parking Fee Calculator
openGraph.description: A free parking fee calculator that estimates charges from entry/exit times and pricing rules. Factor in base time, additional units, and daily maximum caps to quickly preview how much your parking will cost.
